Header: Gotabhaya Rajapaksa emphasises that the country will not be allowed to be divided
Content: Presidential Candidate Gotabhaya Rajapaksa says that a programme to divide the country will not be implemented under a government led by him. Several public rallies attended by Mr. Gotabhaya Rajapaksa took place in Kurunegala. A large group of people including public representatives attended the public rally at the weekly fair premises at Potuhera. A group of people including opposition leader Mahinda Rajapaksa was present at the public meeting which was held at Alawwa bus stand. Another public rally to ensure the victory of Mr. Gotabhaya Rajapaksa was held in Pannala town. Presidential Candidate Gotabhaya Rajapaksa said that extremist terrorism will not be allowed in the country. He said that the sovereign independent nation will not be allowed to be divided. He said that they could not accept the demands of the Tamil extremist parties and those had to be rejected. He pointed out that they presented a clear programme to improve the economy of the country. The fertilizer subsidy will be given free of charge to develop the agriculture and the farmers’ loans will be written off to help the farmers. The farmers’ insurance scheme and the pension scheme will be reintroduced. He further said that new technology should be introduced to get maximum benefits from the minimum amount of land area to save the farmers from poverty.
